name: winbuild-ignite
description: WinBuild Ignite - Employee Onboarding System (Single Service: Frontend + Backend)

scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm install --production

author: WinWire

comments.deployment: Single Service Mode (Frontend + Backend in One App Service)
azure_deployment_flow: 1. Azure reads .deployment file → finds: command = deploy.cmd
├─ cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
3. Azure runs: npm start (from root package.json)
└─ which runs: cd backend && node server.js
4. Backend server.js detects SINGLE_SERVICE=true env var
5. Backend serves pre-built React frontend from /frontend/build/
6. Backend handles ALL traffic: API + SPA routes
comments.important: Only ONE process starts (backend). Frontend is pre-built during deploy.cmd
comments..deployment_file: Tells Azure which deployment script to run (deploy.cmd)
comments.npm_install_root: Azure automatically runs npm install in root if package.json exists (default behavior)
